
    .myc-visuallyhidden {
        border: 0;
        clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
        height: 1px;
        margin: -1px;
        overflow: hidden;
        padding: 0;
        position: absolute;
        width: 1px;
    }

    html[lang="ar"] .globalnotice > div {
        padding: 24px 80px 24px 40px;
    }

    html[lang="ar"] .globalnotice > div:after {
        left: inherit;
        right: 40px; 
    }

    .globalnotice {
        background: #0057B8;
        position: relative;
    }

    .globalnotice a:focus {
        outline: 3px dotted #000000;
        outline-offset: 3px;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .globalnotice * {
        font-family: Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        color: #fff;
    }

    .globalnotice > div {
        padding: 20px 40px 24px 80px;
        color: #fff;
        max-width: 1180px;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .globalnotice a:focus {
    outline: 3px dotted #000000;
        outline-offset: 3px;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .globalnotice > div:after {
        content:'';
        background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) no-repeat;
        background-size: cover;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 20px;
        left: 40px;
    }

    .globalnotice p {
        font-size: 18px;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 24px;
        max-width: 60%;
        color: #fff;
    }

    .globalnotice p.header {
        font-weight: 600;
    }

    .globalnotice div > a {
        font-size: 18px;
        text-align: center;
        line-height: 40px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #fff;
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0 40px;
        color: #fff;
        border-radius: 999vw;
        position: absolute;
        right: 40px;
        top: calc(50% - 20px);
    }

    .globalnotice ul  {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .globalnotice ul li {
        margin-top: 12px;
        font-size: 18px;
        line-height: 24px;
    }
    .globalnotice ul li span {
        font-size: 18px;
        line-height: 24px;
    }

    .globalnotice ul a, .globalnotice ul a:visited, .globalnotice ul a:hover {
        font-size: 18px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid;
        line-height: 1.33em;
        color: #fff;
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    .globalnotice.warning {
        background: #ffc845;
    }

    .globalnotice.warning *,.globalnotice.warning a:hover  {
        color: #000 !important;
    }

    .globalnotice.warning > div:after {
        background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) no-repeat;
        background-size: cover;
    }

    @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .globalnotice > div {
            padding: 20px 16px 24px 56px;
        }

        .globalnotice ul li, p.header, .globalnotice ul li span {
            font-size: 16px;
        }

        .globalnotice div > a {
            position: relative;
            left: 0;
            margin-top: 16px;
            padding: 0 24px;
        }

        .globalnotice div:after {
            left: 16px;
            top: 17px;
        }

        .globalnotice p {
            max-width: 100%;
        }
        li {
            line-height: 1.5em;
        }
    }      
    @media print {
        .globalnotice {
            display: none;
        }
    }

          .top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox {
									display: -webkit-box;
									display: flex;
									-webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
									-webkit-box-direction: normal;
									flex-direction: row;
									-webkit-box-pack: start;
									justify-content: flex-start;
									justify-items: flex-start;
									justify-content: space-between;
									flex-wrap: wrap;
								}

								.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div {
									width: 48.7%;
									text-align: left;
									order: 2;
								}

								.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div+div {
									order: 1;
								}

								.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div h2 {
									text-align: left;
									font-weight: normal;
									font-size: 28px;
									line-height: 36px;
									margin-bottom: 24px !important;
									text-transform: none;
									position: relative;
								}

								.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div h2 span {
									display: block;
									text-align: left;
									font-weight: normal;
									font-size: 28px;
									line-height: 36px;
									margin-bottom: 24px !important;
									text-transform: none;
									position: relative;
								}


								.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div p {
									margin-bottom: 36px;
									margin-top: 0;
								}

								@media screen and (max-width: 860px) {
									.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div h2 span {
										display: inline;
									}
								}

								@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

									.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div {
										width: 100%;
										text-align: center;
										order: 1;
									}

									.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox {
										padding-left: 20px;
										padding-right: 20px;
									}

									.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div h2,
									.top-task-full .full-width .sub-full-bleed.answers-campaign .contentbox div h2 span {
										font-size: 24px;
										line-height: 26px !important;
										text-align: center;
										margin-top: 24px !important;
									}


								}
